snippet: As the year winds down, the Big City Book Club is seeking the wisdom of crowds to help make our next selections. We are asking for suggestions: What is the best New York-centric book you read in 2015?
lead_paragraph: As the year winds down, the Big City Book Club is seeking the wisdom of crowds to help make our next selections. We are asking for suggestions: What is the best New York-centric book you read in 2015?
